articles.author: BROOKS KUBENA | Staff writer
articles.title: Transfers, suspensions and opt-outs: A timeline of LSU's 18 scholarship player departures - The Advocate
articles.description: Since LSU's national championship season ended, 18 scholarship football players have left the football team in some fashion. Seven players opted out of the season. Six transferred to other schools.
